page.title: 05Knebworth Variety Club
page.content: The Knebworth Variety club is a charity which raises money for people in need. They perform an Old Time Music Hall variety show twice a year. The club consists of local people who enjoy acting. Rehearsals begin about two months before each performance and take place on Tuesday and Thursday evenings. The show is performed each evening for one week in the Village Hall. The audience sit at candle-lit tables and waitresses serve drinks and a simple ploughman's lunch during the performance.
